data.title: Reshmi Ghosh
data.meta_description:
Name: Reshmi Ghosh

Age: 27 years

Height: 5’7’’

Weight: 58 Kg

Vital statistics (in inches): 34-28-28

Crowned: Miss India Earth 2002

Profession: Acting, Modeling

Relationship Status: Single

City: Mumbai

College: Gokhale Memorial College




Coolest pick up line you have ever heard?
You are a very sweet girl.

What is the craziest rumour you have heard about yourself?
It has to be the the time II read about my break up with my Kyunki Saas co star, who the report said I had been dating. It was so hilarious that my brother called my early in the morning after reading that news. And off course it wasn’t true.

Do you have a tattoo or a piercing in a secret place? Where?
No, I can’t go through the pain of body piercing but last Valentines Day I pierced my nose

What is the sexiest single article of clothing a woman can wear?
A Chiffon Sari

How sexy is intellect?
I like intelligent people who with good sense of humour. Intelligence is big turn on for me.

Is nude photography an art form or an entertainment? Or it can be both?
I would have said it’s rubbish few years ago but have seen few pictures of my friend and realized that you have to have the eye to appreciate the beauty. It’s a real work of art. If a person has the right body, the right photography can do wonders.

With which celebrity would you like to go on a vacation...
Shah Rukh Khan. I not afan of anyone but having met him on Nach Baliye set I felt he is extremely intelligent man. I would love to know him. I would like to fall in love with a guy like him.

Do you think live-in is a good way to check out a relationship?
Yes it is, because we need to know the person whom you going to spend your life with . I think it’s important to know the person and live in is definitely a good way to do that.

Your body to you means...
Initially I didn’t like my body but through other’s eyes I now find myself beautiful. I am in love with my hair, eyes and complexion. I think I have a better body than before.

A man’s most attractive feature...
Eyes and Smile

Success or riches?
Success

One word in which you would like to be described to a guy...
Simple

Favorite Actor: SRK

Favorite Sportsman: Sachin Tendulkar and Saurav Ganguly

Favorite Movies: Sound Of Music

Love is...Incomplete

Food is...Best

Sex is...The ultimate

Modelling Assignments: Junior Horlics, Nile and Neem Toothpaste, Sing noodles, Khadims, Brainware computers, Ibiza (print), Coca-Cola (TV), Madhushree Sarees

TV Appearances: Kyun Ki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi, Kayamath, Karam Apnaa Apnaa. Anchored Nach Baliye, Kaun Jitega Bollywood Ka Ticket, and Dance Pe Chance.

Movies: Pa Ma Ga Re Sa, Anees Bazmi’s Thank You (under production)

Regional movie: Uro Chithi(Bengali)
